com.ibm.micro.client.mqttv3

Class MqttTopic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.micro.client.mqttv3.MqttTopic

  • public class MqttTopic
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a topic destination, used for publish/subscribe messaging.
